channel.title: Complex question [508]
channel.description: would it be possible to create a central bank that any player can access with a command such as ::swissbank or w/e? kind of like a central item-sharing box.

item.title: Complex question [508]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:15, topic:368965”][quote author=dunlopghost link=topic=465096.msg3401260#msg3401260 date=1289946576]
we have an ::empty command. but the trade system isnt all good, which is why this would be useful
[/quote]I’m just saying, you’re not going to run a successful server.[/quote]

I contradict myself, but true.

Read full topic

we have an ::empty command. but the trade system isnt all good, which is why this would be useful

item.title: Complex question [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:11, topic:368965”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=465096.msg3401160#msg3401160 date=1289942438]

noobs, you don’t seem to understand. it would act like a player’s normal bank, but the difference would be that anyone can access it and withdraw/deposit. there would still be a normal bank, but this bank would be for people who want to share wealth, etc. there would obviously be requirements for use put in place though. like completing a quest or something.
[/quote]No, I understand exactly what you mean. But the point is that it [quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=465096.msg3401135#msg3401135 date=1289941574]
would be abused so bad…

Some people would just wait until someone deposits something, then withdraw it and sell it.
[/quote]

Then you wouldn’t put anything in there that you don’t want nobody else getting hold of. I think it’s a good idea. Easy way to deposit junk that someone else might want.[/quote]Yea, it’s called dropping! But you realize doing this will ruin any skill setup you have? Basically adding an ::empty command, allowing people to train indefinably.

Read full topic

item.title: Complex question [508]
item.dc:creator: @dunlopghost dunlopghost
item.description:
@dunlopghost wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:10, topic:368965”][quote author=dunlopghost link=topic=465096.msg3401155#msg3401155 date=1289942170]
noobs, you don’t seem to understand. it would act like a player’s normal bank, but the difference would be that anyone can access it and withdraw/deposit. there would still be a normal bank, but this bank would be for people who want to share wealth, etc. there would obviously be requirements for use put in place though. like completing a quest or something.
[/quote]No, I understand exactly what you mean. But the point is that it [quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=465096.msg3401135#msg3401135 date=1289941574]
would be abused so bad…
[/quote]

Some people would just wait until someone deposits something, then withdraw it and sell it.[/quote]

you cant sell items to shops in our server. plus, there wouldn’t be much of a point of trading them to other people because acquiring things are pretty easy. Rc-Scape is more of a funserver than a serious-play kind of thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Complex question [508]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:10, topic:368965”][quote author=dunlopghost link=topic=465096.msg3401155#msg3401155 date=1289942170]
noobs, you don’t seem to understand. it would act like a player’s normal bank, but the difference would be that anyone can access it and withdraw/deposit. there would still be a normal bank, but this bank would be for people who want to share wealth, etc. there would obviously be requirements for use put in place though. like completing a quest or something.
[/quote]No, I understand exactly what you mean. But the point is that it [quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=465096.msg3401135#msg3401135 date=1289941574]
would be abused so bad…
[/quote]

Some people would just wait until someone deposits something, then withdraw it and sell it.[/quote]

Then you wouldn’t put anything in there that you don’t want nobody else getting hold of. I think it’s a good idea. Easy way to deposit junk that someone else might want.

Read full topic
